channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Going beyond singleton, scoped, and transient lifetimes
item.description: In this post I investigate some 'experimental' dependency injection scopes that provide additional features over Singleton, Scoped, and Transient Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/going-beyond-singleton-scoped-and-transient-lifetimes/

item.title: NetEscapades.​AspNetCore.​SecurityHeaders 1.0.0 has been released
item.description: In this post I describe the recent major changes to NetEscapades.AspNetCore.SecurityHeaders, a NuGet package for adding security headers to your apps. Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/netescapades-aspnetcore-securityheaders-1-0-0-released/
